pullRequest.title: [icalendar] Describe download exceptions a bit more detailed.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixes #8846 by just adding a human readable description of the exception and moves details into debug log.
Just a small change.

commit.message:
[icalendar] Describe download exceptions a bit more detailed.

Fixes #8846

Signed-off-by: Michael Wodniok <michi@noorganization.org>

[icalendar] Apply suggestions from code review
